mapper.select: select ORDINAL_POSITION AS `Seqno`, `COLUMN_NAME` as `Field`, `DATA_TYPE` as `DataType`, (CASE `IS_NULLABLE` WHEN 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as `IsNullable`, (case `COLUMN_Key` WHEN 'PRI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) `IsPrimaryKey`, (case `EXTRA` when 'auto_increment' then 1 else 0 end) `IsIdentity`, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS `Length`, NUMERIC_PRECISION AS `Precision`, NUMERIC_SCALE AS `Scale`, `COLUMN_DEFAULT` as `DefaultValue`, `COLUMN_COMMENT` as `Display` from (select * from information_schema.columns where table_name = ?) t
SELECT `DATA_TYPE` as `Name` FROM information_schema.COLUMNS GROUP BY DATA_TYPE
select `table_name` as `Name` from information_schema.tables where table_type='base table' and table_schema=database();
select `table_name` as `Name` from information_schema.TABLES where table_schema in('information_schema','mysql','performance_schema');
